reviews.content: My experience was with Dr.Kamra. I saw him for rashes  3 times and he kept referring me to specialists.  He could not even diagnose simple shingles as was diagnosed by another Physician. I am glad I sought a second opinion.  I was in the hospital prior to that and again was misdiagnosed.  So disappointed.

This used to be my cardiologist and General MD Dr. Kamara. I went to them recently and Dr. Kamara said I had cellulitis. After a week I was still having symptoms. Dr. Kamara and Idicula would not see me so I went to the ER. Good thing I questioned the diagnosis. It turns out I had DVT which can kill you!!! I was treated for it at the hospital and okay now. Have to say these are not my doctors anymore!!!!
